data.title: O, how smooth and succulent!!!!
data.text:
On my visit from Cali------->ATL, I visited Pino (at the ATL airport). O, how I LOVED this gelato. It was so smooth and flavorful. In the sovereign nation of Cali, the gelato is not very good. It is creamy and thick and not made with ice. 

I have the strawberry/mango and my tummy and brain were high on delicious!!! Yummi stuff....

data.title: Good Gelatto
data.text: It doesn't offer much flavors but it satisfies your gelato cravings. A little expensive (but most gelatos are), overall it is better than just ice cream.

data.title: Right Gelato
data.text: The women that waited on us was great. She understood my story about getting sorbeto at Italian Cafe when I ordered Gelato. The Gelato here was very creamy and tasted oh so good. Can not wait til this weekend. I plan to have some again.

data.title: Yummy Gelato
data.text: Authentic Italian recipes. Had the butter pecan. Delicious. Had several other flavors to choose from. Oh, and this did not come out of a wall if you know what I mean. In other words, it is scooped from a container vs coming out of a spigot. I hate those. The customer service was friendly. If you visit Marietta Square, you should make a stop here. Check out their website at piano gelato.com. They have several locations.

data.title: Yummmmmmm
data.text:
I ate at Pino the first time in the Atlanta airport concourse C across from Moe's, so delicious I say check out all their locations! 

My Mom got the whiskey chocolate - word to the wise: not for children! Seriously loaded with whiskey! LOL 

I got biscotti and white chocolate in a waffle cone. 

Pricey but worth it if you call it dinner!

data.title: MMMM, will visit again!
data.text: I visited this cute little Gelato shop on the Marietta Square for the first time on Saturday with the kids.  They were handing out free samples of a mulled apple cider right outside of the shop, which was delightful.  We came in after shopping at the adjacent, attached store.  All of us got gelato, and I also enjoyed their house brewed coffee.  The gelato was incredible!!!  We should have gotten the three scoops instead of two.  We'll know for next time ;)  There were a very good variety of flavors too, not a ton of different flavors, but a good variety.  We'll definately be back.

data.title: Icecream
data.text: Not bad, will return. Lots of different choices. Prices are a little high. Under new ownership. Located in the old Jonny Walker building.
